name: Reality Roll
description:
Welcome to a place where reality is not certain.

In this twist on a classic ballroller game you have to reach the goal without falling off the platforms. But beware not every part of the platforms can be trusted.

Controls:

Move with WASD

Control camera with QE (Web) or Mouse (Download)

Pause game with SPACE (Web) or ESCAPE (Download)

For a quick restart press R

You can play in browser or download the game as you like. Have fun!

Feedback is very much appreciated! Good luck with your own submission!

This game was made in one week during the Brackeys GameJam 2022.1

Only the music is not made by myself:

Musik by JuliusH on Pixabay
